subtasks: Approach the seed planter machine.
Operate the seed planter machine to plant seeds in rows.
Walk through the field, monitoring the planting progress.

tasks.task: Driving a tractor to plow the field.
subtasks: Mount the tractor seat.
Engage the plow attachment.
Operate the tractor to navigate the field, pulling the plow.
Turn the tractor as needed to cover the entire area.

tasks.task: Attaching a tool to a three-point hitch.
subtasks: Identify the tool attachment point.
Align the tool with the tractor's three-point hitch.
Secure the hitch pin to connect the tool to the tractor.

tasks.task: Operating a sprayer to apply pesticide.
subtasks: Assemble the pesticide sprayer.
Connect the spray boom to the tractor's hydraulic system.
Calibration of the spray nozzles for even distribution.
Drive the tractor through the field, activating the spray system.
Monitor the spray pattern and adjust as necessary.

tasks.task: Using a hay loader to stack hay in the field.
subtasks: Approach the hay loader machine.
Operate the loader to pick up hay bales.
Bring the bales to the designated stacking location.
Place the hay bales on the stack, ensuring stability.

tasks.task: Driving a combine harvester for harvesting crops.
subtasks: Mount the combine harvester seat.
Attach the combine to the tractor, if needed.
Operate the combine's intake conveyors to feed crops.
Adjust the threshing mechanism settings for optimal performance.
Monitor grain loss and clean the air intakes as necessary.

tasks.task: Repairing a broken down piece of equipment.
subtasks: Identify the faulty equipment.
Consult the equipment manual or seek expertise to diagnose the problem.
Gather necessary replacement parts and tools.
Disassemble the equipment to access the problem area.
Replace damaged components or make repairs.
Reassemble the equipment, testing functionality before use.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Planting seeds in a field.
Driving a tractor to plow the field.
Attaching a tool to a three-point hitch.
Operating a sprayer to apply pesticide.
Using a hay loader to stack hay in the field.
Driving a combine harvester for harvesting crops.
Repairing a broken down piece of equipment.
